item.title: Sensors and Sensibility: The Internet of Things
item.description:
Buzzwords of warning

The IT industry thrives on buzzwords. It’s the industry’s fashion catwalk, and there are a large number of examples where existing products have been re-named to include and associate with a new trend. By far the biggest example in recent years is Cloud. In fact because the renaming was so rife, it generated its own buzzword: “Cloudwashing.” It would seem that any product or service that had a network connection was, in some way, a Cloud.
